2. Alexa,set living room light to 50 percent.

3. Alexa,brighten/dim living room light.

4. Alexa,set living room light to christmas mode. 1. Ok Google, turn on bedroom light.

2. Ok Google, turn off bedroom light.

3. Ok Google, set bedroom light to 50 percent.

4. Ok Google, brighten bedroom light. In order to use the app normally you must open all permissions, click agree opened go to open Permissions to access %1s is not allowed.Please turn on this permission in the settings Location storage Camera Allow "Bluetooth" permission Allow "Nearby Devices" permission Turn on Bluetooth (or try again) Rino Smart App requests the following permissions Location Use to search for nearby devices, display WiFi names, and automate scenes Media file Use to access files such as device-related pictures, audio, and video Photograph Use to scanning, taking photos, recording videos, etc
WiFi password WiFi SSID

In order to present our collection and use of your personal information more comprehensively, we have made detailed revisions to the Privacy Policy and User Agreement in accordance with the requirements of the latest laws and regulations. When you click [Agree], it means that you have fully read, understood and accepted the entire contents of the updated Privacy Policy and User Agreement. Please take some time to familiarize yourself with our Privacy Policy and please feel free to contact us if you have any questions. App fails to be allowed to access Bluetooth App needs access of Mobile's Bluetooth to add and use bluetooth devices. No account to use full function Cancel account Are you sure you want to cancel？ Your account will be permanently deactivated after one week and all the following information in your account will be deleted, if you log in again before then, your deactivation request will be cancelled Dear User Make sure submit a request to "cancel account" and it will be cancelled on %1s. During this time, if you log in to your account, your cancellation request will be revoked. After the cancellation, the platform will delete all personal data under your account, if you want to cancel your request, you can do so by logging in before %1s. Thank you for your use. Logout complete Confirm cancellation You can retrieve the verification code after %1s seconds Click "Get Verification Code" and the verification code will be sent to your %1s Phone Email The account has been cancelled, if you want to withdraw, please log in again If you do not receive the verification code, we recommend you to confirm the following actions. 1. Please check if the country/region on the App registration page is selected correctly 2. Please check whether your phone is off or no network 3. Please check if the number/email you entered is correct 4. Please check whether your verification code is blocked or quarantined by the system If the above confirmation is correct, or you cannot receive the verification code, can send email to accountapp@rinoiot.com accountapp@rinoiot.com Please enter the correct format of account number Please enter the 4-digit verification code sent to %1s, valid for 10 minutes User Agreement and Privacy Policy Agree Disagree %1s Provide authentication service Please agree to the TOS To login in Smart Panel, Pls confirm! Find a device Bind device Register to the cloud Device initialisation Device is being added, do you want to exit? Device may be in the process of being added. If you confirm out, please follow the procedure to reset the device the next time you add it Continue adding Network failure online Offline Device is being connected Keep device powered on May sure device is near phone Device is offline Switching WiFi The currently connected 5GHz WiFi may cause adding a device to fail, continue? (Recommend switching to 2.4GHz WiFi) You are not connected to WiFi Go to Connect Devices can be added Pending device reset %1s devices found Start pairing Click to add a device Added successfully If you want to bind the device, you need to put the device in the wiring mode Got it View guide Connected Last used network Available networks Searching… This is a 5GHz WiFi Select the room Name Rename Please turn on the Bluetooth Scan failed… What should I do if the scan fails? Probably due to the current network environment is poor or has been bind by others. 1. Make sure the distance between the phone and the device is close enough and there is no strong interference in the surrounding network environment. 2. Make sure the location permission of the app is open. 3. If you still can't find the device, it may be because the device has been bind by someone else. If you are not sure who has bound the device, you can reset it, please refer to the manual or select "manually add" device in the app and follow the guide. 4. Bluetooth devices, please check whether the device is normally powered on, or phone Bluetooth has been opened.
